column1: anthony l. romano| anthony l. romano (died june 14
column3: husband of 53 years to colleen (hart) romano; loving father of colleen (eric) weber; proud grandfather of anthony (katy) martuscelli; and great-grandfather to khloi and luca. he was brother to antoinette bonecutter and richard romano. anthony proudly served as a sergeant in the u. s. marine corps. he is also survived by his niece
column10: and dominick. friends received wednesday from 2-4 and 6-8 pm at devlin funeral home
column12: ross twp. mass of christian burial will be held at st. alexis church
